meta.description: Optimize the number of hand sanitizer machines to minimize total machines while meeting delivery and energy constraints.

params.name: delivery_rate
params.description: Delivery rate in drops per minute for each machine type.

params.name: energy_consumption
params.description: Energy consumption in kWh per minute for each machine type.

params.name: max_manual_fraction
params.description: Maximum fraction of machines that can be manual.

params.name: min_motion_activated
params.description: Minimum number of motion activated machines required.

params.name: min_drops_per_minute
params.description: Minimum total drops per minute required.

params.name: max_energy_per_minute
params.description: Maximum energy consumption per minute allowed.

vars.name: num_machines
vars.description: Number of machines of each type to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_machines
objective.description: Minimize the total number of machines.

constraints.name: delivery_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1000 drops per minute are delivered.

constraints.name: energy_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure energy consumption does not exceed 500 kWh per minute.

constraints.name: manual_fraction_constraint
constraints.description: At most 40% of the machines can be manual.

constraints.name: min_motion_activated_constraint
constraints.description: At least 3 machines must be motion activated.
